titles.title: I Will Rejoice In You And Be Glad

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will rejoice in You and be glad.
I will extol Your love more than wine.
Draw me unto Thee and let us run together.
I will rejoice in You and be glad.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
More than when the corn and the new wine abound.
Thou hast put gladness in my heart. (Repeat.)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
So lift up the light of Thy countenance upon us, O Lord.
Lift up the light of Thy countenance upon us, O Lord.
